attributes.action: Make RSPCA freedom foods standards, the minimum for all indoor chickens raised for meat production
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel strongly that all meat production should be free range, but to ask for an outright ban straight away is unfeasable as farmers need time to change. Hence we are starting with small steps, asking initially that the minimum standards for all broiler houses, are at least equal to those of RSPCA freedom foods, whereby birds are less crammed and have mental stimulation

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make RSPCA freedom foods standards, the minimum for all indoor chickens raised for meat production."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page19024


Prime Minister's Office
